item.title: There are 3 large foam filled sofa covers dumped in Prestbury Road, 4th November
item.description:
There are 3 large foam filled covers that have been dumped behind an Open Reach Broadband installation. They have been there ages and I walk past everyday with my dog and it's annoying. It is opposite the Prestbury Car Valeting Service which is next to Selim Smith Funeral Directors. Please could you make arrangements to have them taken away...thank you ...
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 267, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Park Place near junction with The Park

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Park Place, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Barbed wire next to PROW, 4th November
item.description:
Land owner as part of the planning application for a housing development at stoke orchard has fenced off certain areas near the PROW. However one has been done using barbed wire strung within a hedge and is extremely dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Zura Drive, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Gloucester

item.title: More fly tipping, 4th November
item.description:
Various black bags, a small mattress and a sofa have appeared inn the last 2 days. In the usual place on the corner of Pates Avenue and Alstone Lane. Happens constantly at this location.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Pates Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obscured bend sign and illuminating SLOW sign, 4th November
item.description:
Left hand side coming down Harp Hill GL526PX area. Sign obscured by trees on approach to upcoming bend, as is illuminating SLOW warning sign which isnâ€™t obvious on approach to this area, and is seen late thus not giving drivers adequate warning to slow as bend approached

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog mess on pavement at bottom of brick wall, 4th November
item.description:
Dog mess on pavement at bottom of brick wall. The bit of pavement it's on is opposite No 33. The brick wall is the rear of a property on Old Bath Road, that's why there's no number of the house.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Westbury Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path ends on a busy road, 4th November
item.description:
Why is this path even here? it leads to a road right by junction 10 of the m5, it's not a nice walk - there's lanes which go from Boddington to the A4019 which are much more direct. pointless, hated every moment i was walking on it, will not walk it again!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
